sentences.sentence: "Forever," says one girl with a bandana over her face.
sentences.translation: “永远”一个用头巾裹住脸的女孩说。

sentences.sentence: A bandana is good head protection and is an all around useful item to have.
sentences.translation: 阿头巾是好的头部保护，是一个有益的项目各地有。

sentences.sentence: I turned on the little red bandana dimbulb and we poured wine and all sat around talking.
sentences.translation: 我揭开小灯泡上的红色大方巾然后我们斟了酒并一起围坐着聊天。
